content:
UpdateCheck Enum

Definition

Specifies when objects are to be tested for concurrency conflicts.

In this Article

public enum UpdateCheck
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
UpdateCheck

Remarks

The code example after the table specifies that HomePage objects should never be tested.

Fields

Always

Always check. This is the default unless stem.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.IsVersion* is true for a member.
Never

Never check.
WhenChanged

Check only when the object has been changed.
